pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, January 18, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, January 18, 2017:

Sherbrooke, Québec

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Lac-Mégantic, Jean-Guy Cloutier.

Closed to media.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will stop by the Tim Hortons in the Student Union Building at Bishop’s University.

Student Union Building
Bishop’s University
2600 Rue College
Sherbrooke, Québec

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.


10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Centennial Theatre Lobby
Bishop’s University
2600 Rue College
Sherbrooke, Québec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.


Granby, Québec

11:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Cantine Chez Ben.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Please note that all times are local.
